ygData.subject: Starting over
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes. I want to start COMPLETELY over. Different character...possible a different server. I want to play with people who roleplay. I am very new to roleplaying
ygData.messageBody:
Yes. I want to start COMPLETELY over. Different
character...possible a different server. I want to play with people
who roleplay. I am very new to roleplaying but enjoy
getting into it. I want to play with people that help
each other...and those who refuse to help those
classes and or races that they are"supposed" to hate! But
again...i dont want to play on a PVP server. Most people
are on there just to mess with people. There are some
great players on PVP servers...just that the jerks
outweight the rest for me. Am i a freak here? Is there
anyone out there who would care to bring me in? Thank
you all for your time!<br><br>-Sarah
